UNION
SELECT si.name, si.id,u.type,u.username,si.tb_class_id AS class_id from experiment_lab AS el INNER JOIN course_schedule AS cs ON (el.lab_id =cs.lab_id AND cs.stealth =2 AND el.stealth =2) INNER JOIN scourse_student AS ss ON cs.schedule_id =ss.schedule_id INNER JOIN student_info AS si ON ( ss.student_id = si.id ) INNER JOIN `user` AS u ON (u.type=2 AND si.id =u.id AND u.stealth =2) WHERE el.lab_id =#{labId} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT cmu.user_id FROM clock_in_machine_user AS cmu WHERE cmu.clockin_id = #{clockinId} AND si.id =cmu.user_id AND cmu.is_deleted =0 ) GROUP BY si.id ORDER BY NULL
